summary: Sexy man looking for a companion to journey across Tamriel with. Apply Within lol. Must be able to kick dragons asses.
descriptionHtml:
This is my last MOD. Lets go out with a Bang, please Endorse.

Derek Storm is a Level 15 Solid Male Nord Barbarian. 
He loves Big Weapons.
He will level with you, is marriageable, and will protect you till the end.  He is in Riverwood inn (I know, its crowded in there). If you have any issues, let me know.


Mods I used to create him are 
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles
More Muscular Men   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4145
ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168#content(This is a must or he wont work) Make sure it is before Derek in load order please.
ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0 5,879 
The Eyes of Beauty  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722


I\'d just like to say, although i love making followers, I\'m going to stop simply because there are so many wonderful followers out there much better than mine, and even though i know mine are good, they are not great, and don\'t seem to get the exposure i was hoping for.  You can\'t teach an old dog new tricks.  But i do love you all, i\"m not complaining.
author: Lycanheart
